thread.title: Tavisca Solutions Honored With a Magellan Silver Award, 2015
thread.title_full: Tavisca Solutions Honored With a Magellan Silver Award, 2015 - CBS News 8 - San Diego, CA News Station - KFMB Channel 8

author: cbs8
title: Tavisca Solutions Honored With a Magellan Silver Award, 2015
text:
Tavisca Solutions
PLANO, Texas , September 16, 2015 /PRNewswire/ --
Tavisca Solutions, a leading enterprise in Travel Technology and innovative solutions added another feather to its cap when they received the prestigious Magellan Silver Award, 2015, under Online Travel Services, Booking Interface category. The Magellan Award, by Travel Weekly, is a premier award, judged by a panel of top travel industry professionals, honoring a high standard of excellence with the travel industry.
(Logo: http://photos.prnewswire.com/prnh/20150604/748192 )
"People who enter this award, know that they are competing against a bunch of extremely creative individuals or organizations, which are the pioneering forefront of the travel domain," said Mahendra Yadav , CEO , Tavisca Solutions . "With the competition becoming more and more stringent every year, the winners who walked away with the award this time scaled themselves to a new height. We are extremely proud and honored to receive this award, knowing that this award is judged by industry experts with extremely high standards of excellence," he added.
The news of this award comes only a month after tavisca was named among the Top 5 Best Places to Work in by GPTW (Great Places to Work).
"Being selected for the Magellan Award is an instance of much pride, and it showcases that we represent a high standard of excellence within the travel industry. We are pleased to be recognized for our highly-personalized service and exceptional excellence when it comes to providing the right mix of business solutions and technical finesse," said Kaustubh Latkar, Sr. Vice President, Tavisca Solutions. Tavisca Solutions takes home this silver with it's flagship offering, travelnxt, a PCI PA-DSS compliant online booking engine , pre-integrated with over 40 suppliers.
This year 'The 2015 Magellan Award' received entries from the top organizations in the travel domain, the organizations that are constantly striving to innovate in the travel industry with bleeding edge technology and business ideas.
About Travel Weekly Awards
Travel Weekly and TravelWeekly.com are the most influential B2B news resources for the travel industry. Via a multimedia portfolio of products, Travel Weekly and TravelWeekly.com deliver all the late-breaking news, analysis and research that travel professionals need to succeed.
In a rapidly changing and competitive marketplace, Travel Weekly and TravelWeekly.com provide travel professionals with a necessary global perspective through in-depth coverage of every business sector, including airline, car rental, cruise, destination, hotel and tour operator as well as technology, economic and governmental issues. Through its leadership events and key industry alliances, Travel Weekly extends its position as the most influential business publication in the industry.
About Tavisca Solutions
Tavisca Solutions , a travel technology products and solutions provider that works with travel companies (B2B, B2C, and B2B2C) across the globe and helps them enhance their online business. With the vision to build future-focused technology building blocks that solve key challenges in online travel business, tavisca ® offers a versatile suite of cloud-based SaaS products, deciphering every aspect of customer and agent-facing online booking engines, travel mid & back-office agency operations management system .
Established in 2008, tavisca ® has emerged into a team of travel technology specialists with over 300 dedicated personnel and two state-of-the-art development centers in India , and the sales and marketing office in the U.S. Today, tavisca ® continues to soar all its position amongst the top 100 GPTW list of best places to work in India for three consecutive years.
tavisca ' s core offering travelnxt is a PCI PA-DSS compliant online travel booking management software that works across Air, Hotel, Car Deals, Activities, Transfers and Insurance with a Strong Booking Engine, Static Package Builder and Inventory Management System. Annually, tavisca ' s travel technology empowers more than a million online travel bookings globally.
For Products and Demo Queries Contact - sales@tavisca.com
Press and Media Contact: beacon@tavisca.com
